resources.string: Enactus, previously known as SIFE, is an international non-profit organization present in 37 countries that \"brings together student, academic and business leaders who are committed to using the power of entrepreneurial action to improve the quality of life and standard of living for people in need\" (Enactus, 2013).\n\nEnactus DeVry Calgary is a non profit student organization on the DeVry Campus. We bring together the top leaders of today and tomorrow to create a better, more sustainable world through the positive power of business. While serving the Calgary community through countless volunteer hours we gain the knowledge, experience and connections to start our careers upon graduation.
Contribution of Enactus Members on the Skilled Finances Application
Charanjeev Johal: GUI interface Designer and Documentation Designer
Lauriane Kunzler: Tester and Lead of the project
Arvinder Singh: Position to be decided with him
Lindsay Smella: Programmer and Lead of the Project
For each question choose the best answer out of all the options. Each answer will lead to an explanation about the answer that you chose.
